title: Make Zone (Uruguay departments) dropdown scrollable in Discover filters

requirements.summary: Make the Zone select dropdown scrollable so all 19 Uruguay departments (plus the 'Todos los departamentos' option) are reachable on typical mobile viewports without affecting the other selects.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the Zone dropdown shows a scrollable list when the options exceed the available vertical space.
All items in `URUGUAY_DEPARTMENTS` plus the `ALL_DEPARTMENTS` option can be reached via scrolling and selected.
Scrolling works with mouse wheel/trackpad on desktop and touch scrolling on mobile.
No layout regressions to the Minimum/Maximum Category selects in the same sheet.

file_operations.description: Update only the Zone dropdown to use the existing shadcn/ui Select composition (Select + SelectContent) with a constrained max height and vertical overflow scrolling (e.g., max-height based on available viewport space and `overflow-y-auto`) so long option lists are scrollable on mobile and desktop, while leaving the Minimum/Maximum Category selects unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
